Key Match Events: Tanner Bibee escaped a jam in the sixth inning with the bases loaded, only giving up one run.
Brayan Rocchio hit a two-run homer in the top of the seventh inning, giving the Guardians a three-run lead.
Kyle Manzardo went 3-for-4 on Tuesday against the Royals, including another extra-base hit.
Post-Match Reflections: This was a big win for the Guardians, and they never would've been able to win without Rocchio's impact.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians clinched a series victory over the Royals, who were trailing them in the division.
The game was played at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri.
Others: Tanner Bibee relied heavily on his fastball in this start, throwing it right past his opponent 11 times with swings and misses.
